message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll find valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $950000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you have a budget constraint, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $1050000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the negotiations we've had so far.
